title: AWS Training and Certification Course Online
description: Mindmajix's AWS training is a comprehensive learning course for Solutions Architecture that will help you develop and validate your cloud skills and also prepares for the Certified Solutions Architect Associates Exam. Our online AWS Certification Course content is developed and updated frequently by cloud domain experts. Thus, you can stay up to date with the latest technology trends in AWS. You’ll also learn how to design applications and systems on the Amazon cloud platform through hands-on projects and real-life use cases and scenarios.

However, you should be able to understand networking and visualization fundamentals. Having basic knowledge in any of the programming languages is also recommended.
